meanings.definition: To change the texture of something.
meanings.sent1: She retextures the walls in her room to give them a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: The artist retextures the canvas to create a unique painting.
meanings.sent3: The magician retextures the playing cards to make them feel like silk.
meanings.sent4: The chef retextures the sauce, turning it from smooth to chunky.
meanings.sent5: The designer retextures the fabric, transforming it into a luxurious material.

meanings.definition: The act of changing the texture of something.
meanings.sent1: The retextures of the furniture made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent2: I love the retextures on this sculpture; they add depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected retextures on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The retextures of the landscape after the rain were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The retextures of the carpet felt soothing under my feet.
